summary:
Since childhood I’m passionate about engines and energy. This led me to complete my studies at the Technical Professional High School Amsicora IPIA in Olbia (Italy), specializing in ship and shore power plants installation and maintenance, covering all related fields such as power generation and distribution, hydraulic systems, power plant ancillary systems, maintenance and trouble-shooting.

During my academic courses I have been integrating my theoretical studies with practice periods both on board of Tirrenia Ro-ro ferries and during stages at Audi, Porsche, Volkswagen authorized workshops.

During each school summer break I have been working in several positions, ranging from warehousing to carpentry, from restaurant chef assistant to plumber. Aside that, I have been also keeping fit on the boxe ring for the last 5 years.

In November and December 2015 I have successfully completed a Upper-Intermediate English course at the University van Amsterdam where I lived till the end of march, and starting from the January 9th, 2016 I worked as Waste Water Treatment supervisor with Volmer Industrial Services, SNS Industries.

I’m currently based in Nice (france) but I’m willing to relocate, with a minimum initial logistic support. I am looking for a job as DECKHAND on yachts. I have ENG1 certificate and STCW. 
My target is to find a good job on boats in order to start my career and to become a capitain in the future, so for me is important to learn from experienced people, to do my best showing my skills and my flexibility.

From a more personal side, I’m a person with lots of will to learn and work hard. Due to the fact that I’ve been traveling in many European countries during my life, I feel at ease in any environment and culture. I am a hard worker and I am always walking the extra mile. I am striving to learn and be trained, and look forward to grow professionally in order to best serve your company and contribute to its commercial success.
